name: Dank Dodgers
description:
Coder/Assets: (Emmanuel Chrisohoides) https://twitter.com/Emmanuel_C99

Coder/Playtester: (Justin Saperstein) https://www.facebook.com/justin.saperstein?fref=ts

A game where you play as a flying winged skull and must dodge enemies for 60 seconds.

Controls:

WASD - move

Left mouse click - to press restart button.

Updates:

- Fixed a bug where player would lose after 30 seconds even if they never got hit.

- Added a web build

Future updates:

- Need to adjust barriers on side of screen.
